column4: hello, im using windows xp and suse linux, i have grub so i can switch both systems. i want to install the new ubuntu installer which runs ubuntu from windows, anyone knows if i will have a problem (i already have grub installed). thanks a lot for your help
i think that installer is still very experimental and likely to crash or do nasty things to your disks - if it's even completed at all
besides, though i guess that's what you meant, it doesn't *run Ubuntu from Windows*, it merely allows you to start an Ubuntu installation from inside Windows, instead of by booting from a CD
it shouldn't, it should just install another GRUB that can boot your Ubuntu, your SuSE and your Windows. it's certainly much less risky than that Windows installer, at any rate
